column4: ahh its ok ive got it now, i just ran ./configure again, now a makefile has appeared, working now :)
sorry this sounds dumb but im really new to linux: whats the difference between the 'sudo' comand and the 'gksudo' comand?

If you need to run graphical applications as root, use  gksudo , as it will set up the environment more appropriately. Avoid ever using  sudo <GUI-application>  See http://psychocats.net/ubuntu/graphicalsudo for more info
Please try to keep your questions/responses on one line - don't use the "Enter" key as punctuation!
